thread.title: PlayStation 4 drops to €350 across Europe and £300 in the UK

title: PlayStation 4 drops to €350 across Europe and £300 in the UK
text:
PlayStation 4 drops to €350 across Europe and £300 in the UK 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
With Uncharted 4 slipping into 2016, Sony's PlayStation 4 doesn't have much in the way of exclusives this fall. But in its ongoing battle wi...
